website_summaries.verdict: A super deal for larger families on a budget - especially families who like to customize toast to each person's preference.
pros: Great for bagels (slots are extra-wide) and defrosting
Fine-tune your toast with the browning knobs
Reasonable price for a quality 4-slice toaster
cons: Appliance longevity is not as long as some owners would like

customer_reviews.title: JUNK JUNK JUNK
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these before and had it for a long time. Then it started not to toast. I figured this one lasted a long time, let's go with another. WRONG!!!. I got the new one, put in two frozen waffels and had it set on the highest number ( 6 ) and it barely got one side a little tan. Now I grab some bread and put it in and what do I get? Lightly browned on one side, white on the other. afar as I'm concerned this is pure JUNK. Find another toaster to spend $50.00 on.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice toaster until something small goes in, like pop-tart or thin sliced English muffin. Then it falls along the side and gets stuck on the bottom. It's 3 months old and recently started popping up after just 2 seconds of toasting, no matter what darkness setting. Really sad since B&D is such a quality product
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Caruso

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed that it not come in any other shipping box ...
customer_reviews.text: When the toaster arrived, I was disappointed that it not come in any other shipping box other than the manufactures box. So I wasn’t surprised when I discovered a small dent in the chrome. But because it was in the back of the toaster, it could not be scene. Also, the toaster is not stainless; it is chrome. Next to my other stainless countertop appliances, it’s way too shiny. My OCD is telling me to return it.
customer_reviews.author: BobinATL

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster initially
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster initially, exactly what we wanted and perfect price point. However, it only lasted about 6 months before the spring action won't hold down either of the toaster trays. Super frustrating. Since then we bought a Hamilton Beach in a similar design and it died too! I'm now going to buy a toaster for two or three times the money and pray it lasts me more than six months! Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: toaster
customer_reviews.text: its junk it toasts one side darker than the other side one side real dark other side real light .and the crumbs fall out the bottom every time you toast a slice there holes on both sides its junk junk JUNK
customer_reviews.author: bart

customer_reviews.title: It failed on first try. No replacement yet.
customer_reviews.text: It blew up when I put the first piece of bread it--a bright flash of light and it was dead. I was in touch immediately with Black and Decker (have always loved their products) and was told that I would have a replacement within 6-8 days. No replacement ever arrived. I also was asked to send the original back. I did so within a day. No replacement or any other response. I am very, very disappointed and concerned as we have no working toaster for the summer and would prefer not to go out to a store as I'm imuno-compromised.
customer_reviews.author: mtk

customer_reviews.title: Toasting with Bling-Appeal
customer_reviews.text: A very qualitative looking piece of equipment. It will upscale your kitchen with visceral appeal. Toast or muffins you'll get things done quicker. It looks efficient, and with the B&D name brings heavy duty sense of capability and durability. The only short coming that can be resolved with future production is to put the bottom-cleaning-trays in the front for facilitative maintenance, and after-use cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Rolex2Tophorseman1

customer_reviews.title: Bread Warming Device
customer_reviews.text: This is no toaster! On a very hot day in Arizona it still takes at least 4 minutes to start browning a slice of bread. We can toast two slices at a time in our old toaster and get them done sooner than trying all four at once in this bread warmer. Using just one side at a time is no better. It looks very nice, and all the bells and whistles operate smoothly. It gives the impression of a good toaster. We expect it to do a lousy job for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Delany

customer_reviews.title: Just dont
customer_reviews.text: In the quest for a new toaster, this one was given a run and this is my results. The bagel button does not stop the heat elements on the outside part of the bagels, so in the attempt to toast the inside of the bagels I burn the outside. The arched top also negates any of the lift assistance you might get when you pull the lever up, so you will burn your fingers or just quit and leave it behind. The crumb trays also empty from the back so that's super convenient too. Onto the next one
customer_reviews.author: T. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Takes too long to toast. Had to return.
customer_reviews.text: Takes too long to toast. It's convenient to have so many slots but overall not great. I do like the button options and simple-to-use settings. Just doesn't work for me. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: FOUR SLICES!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love having four slots! It's a game changer for my house. NOTES: - Bagels set time at 4 and press the "bagel" button. - English Muffins & Toast set time at 6 - Frozen Waffles set time at 6 and may need to flip the top to the bottom for just a min or two afterwards
customer_reviews.author: DorothyEK

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: I remember when I was young, our toaster always gave us evenly toasted toast. I have yet to find one like that. This toaster has some options I really like such as wide slots, a button to defrost a bagel or a English muffin. But I have to turn the toast knob almost to the highest level to get all sides toasted. If you like lightly toasted, soft bread, then this is perfect. I give it a meh.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE BUYING A COVER
customer_reviews.text: Beware when buying a toaster cover for this toaster. It is 12x12x8 high. The cover Amazon paired it with was way inches and inches too small. You'll need a toaster cover to fit this. The toaster itself is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bohemians with Wanderlust

customer_reviews.title: I did not find that this worked according to some of the reviews
customer_reviews.text: The toaster takes the setting 4 in order to toast in the required time which really dries out the bread The toaster does not toast both sides of the bread evenly. I kept and am using the product even though I am not happy with it
customer_reviews.author: dianne

customer_reviews.title: average
customer_reviews.text: After owning it for three quarters of the year one of the bagel buttons is broke and the left lever that lowers the toast into the toaster immediately pops back up. I would have to say that this is nothing new year The Toasters in years past that have lasted over a decade. Cheaply made I would go with another brand
customer_reviews.author: jna2247

customer_reviews.title: Less than a year before one side broke
customer_reviews.text: Used infrequently, cleaned sporadically, and right side toaster stopped catching less than a year after purchase. Pushing down, it shows no signs that anything is wrong, but will not catch. Not worth the money if you have to buy it again in a year. I will avoid the manufacturer in the future.
customer_reviews.author: WayneStudent8

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this nice looking junk.
customer_reviews.text: If you set it above 2 the things it has a tendency to burn toast/bagels and toasts unevenly. I often have to set it super low and then put it in a second time and it still comes out more toasted in some areas than others. So sorry I bought this. Do yourself a favor and avoid! I gave it a 2 because it is functional but I have to watch it to make sure it doesn't burn.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This taster is exactly what I wanted! I previously purchased a highly rated one from another brand and shop. It was inconsistent and didn't work well for anything other than standard toast. This one is great for frozen bread, bagels, and thick breads, like Ciabatta. Oh, and it makes perfect toast, consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Lester

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this toaster
customer_reviews.text: Takes FOREVER to toast the bread. Have to use darkest setting to get medium color. Worst of all, barely pops the toast up high enough to remove even when pushing the handle up higher. I really should give it a 1 rating but don’t like to do that to anyone. On the bright side, it does seem to be built sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Double Check the Specs Before Ordering
customer_reviews.text: This thing is BIG and takes a lot of counter space. Works as advertised and very happy with the results, so far. Was looking for a simple toaster but all of the extras are nice, as long as they're already included. Kitchen is large enough with counter space but for a smaller kitchen, it could pose a problem.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster has large openings allowing just about anything to be toasted. Bagels, waffles and thick slices of bread fit just fine and toast evenly. Variable settings are nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Dynaflowhum

customer_reviews.title: Good item but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived damaged with some hits in the front and back part. Shipping box was not protective enough, only with original one. I bought it with the Black and Decker waffle maker and looks good in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: M. W. S. S

customer_reviews.title: Nice but needs some work.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about the toaster is the darkness knobs. They turn to easy when cleaning or moving until. You constantly have to check to see what setting it is on. My last toaster from black n decker lasted over 15 years it's still usable but missing one of the push down knobs.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful toaster and really easy to use !
customer_reviews.text: Tested it out this morning and it is really nice. Very pretty and makes an attractive addition to my kitchen. I used regular bread and at a setting of 4 it was perfect ! I like the self adjusting width control that adjusts for thin bread or a wide bagel.
customer_reviews.author: carolinagirl

customer_reviews.title: 3 years for a toaster...just sad
customer_reviews.text: This toaster lasted 3 years. I know it is a year past the warranty but it seems to me having a toaster only last 3 years is very sad. Growing up my parents had one toaster my entire childhood. I used to scoff when people would say things like "They don't make things like they used to" but I guess people were right.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Samford

customer_reviews.title: Nice Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for our existing toaster; love the "frozen" and "bagel" buttons. Had a similar one from B&D that lasted 6 years before one of the heating elements broke, def got our money's worth out of that one so hopefully it will be the same with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Ariane G

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre.
customer_reviews.text: Typically I don’t like to review but I have more than enough time while I wait for a decent toast....now, had my son not thrown the box out in the recycling the day after I got this, I’d have returned it.My other toaster was on the fritz and it did better than this. It doesn’t toast evenly, or accurately. You have to turn the bread to get apps toast. Just plan to spend an eternity waiting for a proper toasting. I have buyers remorse, don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Jesi

customer_reviews.title: Good toaster, my bad for not looking up dimensions.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had any problems with the toaster! I needed to measure my space and look up the measurements of the toaster before I bought it.. It's a little too big for my space, but I made it work anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Hailee Benson

customer_reviews.title: All toasters are not created equal - but this one is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why so many toasters are shoddy, but I'm done with those and LOVE this one. It accommodates thin sliced bread to bagels. The amount of "toastiness" is accurate. I'm loving bagels and frozen waffles again!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ames

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product! Looks great out on the counter
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product! Looks great out on the counter.. Works excellent!! after unpacking it, run both sides thru a cycle or two as recommended in the directions to burn off any factory coating.. UPDATE!!! After 1 year and 7 months of very light use, the right side thru a flame across the counter this morning!! I guess its true that you get what you pay for!! The toaster is literally toast!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan R.

customer_reviews.title: Had this for over a year, LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Great Purchase! we have had ours for over a year and it works great still.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Singletary

customer_reviews.title: Cord is a pain and the setting for browning is not dependable.
customer_reviews.text: I know it’s probably regulations that have to be followed but the cord is so short that I barely can reach the plug! And on my island it doesn’t even reach. When I have it on the counter underneath the upper cabinets it has to be pushed back in order to reach the wall plug so the heat goes under the cabinet which I don’t like. I still haven’t been able to figure out the right place to set the light/dark toast button for our preference. It’ll either burn or not toast it enough. And I’ve used it several times. 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Barker

customer_reviews.title: Love the new toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Love the new toaster! It is a 4 slice, so the footprint is fairly large. The fit and finish are perfect, it toasts evenly on both sides of the bread and we really like the 'Lift Function' and the controls are easy to see and use. If this toaster lasts as long or longer than the crappy one we had before, we will be happy lol.
customer_reviews.author: Edgewalker

customer_reviews.title: Nice toaster.
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster. Looks nice. Lots of settings . Good value and setting number 3 makes it golden brown and not hard. Just what I needed and love have a 4 slice instead of 2.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Renee

customer_reviews.title: Good toaster especially given the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second 4-slice toaster. The previous was a different brand/model that toasted VERY unevenly. This one by contrast is quite even across a slice and side-to-side. The only issue we are experiencing is the bagel setting that likes to toast both sides. We only tried this feature once, so will consider that perhaps we worked it wrong. (The bagel was still fine, just more toasted than we expected.)
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Pro

customer_reviews.title: Great for bread and bagles
customer_reviews.text: This toaster has a bagel button that will perfectly toast 1 side of your bagel for you. Now while it may be great for bread and bagel's I don't recommend toasting pop tarts. Due to the size of pop tarts, they easily fall between the stand and the heating elements. Other than that it is a great toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Jones

customer_reviews.title: Toaster is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great for English muffins. We are very pleased with the toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Riley

customer_reviews.title: Fake products !!!
customer_reviews.text: Fake product. This is not a real Black & Decker. Terrible to cheat people like this.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s good and I haven’t had any issues with it .. it’s been like 2-; months so it’s wii I doing good .. it’s def got wide openings to pick up the bread out of .. I recommend it .. it’s got a nice set up and def very easy set up. Anyone can figure it out in seconds 👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Rigoberto m.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love toast and now that I cam get four slices at one time I love it even more. Toasts perfectly and looks good while doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria L

customer_reviews.title: looks good
customer_reviews.text: one side of the toast is a little lighter, but still good toast
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Bohen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: If you make alot of toaster pastries, more than anything else, this may not be for you, the pastries don't go up far enough to get out of the slot, even with lifting the slider to push them up. Other than that this toaster is great, toasts my bagels perfectly, I did notice that it tends to toast the inside of my toast darker than the outside, not sure if that's the bagel setting acting up or not but don't really mind it as it doesn't burn it and it's close to the other side, I'm just picky about these things.
customer_reviews.author: Annetta

customer_reviews.title: Weird Smell?
customer_reviews.text: So, the toaster works, it matches our other appliances, and for the price it does the job. However, we've had this for a few months and EVERY TIME we use it we smell the faint odor of burning plastic. At first I thought it was just the "newness" of the product, but we've had it for a while and use it almost every day and the smell is still there. I've checked to make sure nothing is stuck inside, the outside of the toaster does not get extremely hot and the "toast" that comes out of the toaster is just fine...I've cleaned it out, wiped it down, etc...still the smell remains.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Takes two hands to remove toast
customer_reviews.text: You have to lift on the lever with one hand to get the toast high enough to grab with the other hand.
customer_reviews.author: Joel H K

customer_reviews.title: Uneven toasting.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't brown evenly on both sides of each slice of bread. However, it's better than our old one so I kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro R Adame

customer_reviews.title: I returned this item because one side would not stay ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item because one side would not stay down when I pushed it down. I ordered from a different company because I tried this toaster twice, with no such luck on either toaster working as it should have.
customer_reviews.author: robert d. metzger

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Over all I am happy with this toaster. It looks great, and works great. My only complaint is that it takes a while to toast (5 minutes). I have never burned my toast with this toaster (you need to set the number pretty high just to get a little toasty)
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S

customer_reviews.title: Big, but works great!
customer_reviews.text: Never had a toaster that really toasts bread golden and crunchy! I tend to like my toast well done and this toaster toasts bread evenly. Haven't used the bagel or frozen options yet, but for toast, it's been great. Keep in mind, this is a "monster" size toaster though. The largest size toaster I've ever owned, but it's nice looking design makes a good addition to my black and stainless steel kitchen. Just wish they'd make standard toasters to fit longer size slices of bread, whether vertical or horizontally. One of my favorite toasters I've owned so far though.
customer_reviews.author: Evast3

customer_reviews.title: Good Toaster for value
customer_reviews.text: I really like this toaster had one for almost 10 years had to upgrade. This one is really simple and very easy to use. It is harder to clean and there will be lines left after.
customer_reviews.author: tommy

customer_reviews.title: BLACK+DECKER 4-Slice Toaster, Stainless Steel, T4030
customer_reviews.text: Great Toaster at a great price. Was back ordered so it took a while to get but so far worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Patti S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I read a host of reviews of toasters when I decided on this one. It is easy to use and clean. Toast is not overdone and done quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Worst toaster ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst toaster ever. Burns one side and barely toasts the other. One side pops up as soon as you start it and then you have to push it back down. I wish I would have kept my 20 yr old toaster.It worked better than this junk.
customer_reviews.author: bruce hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a great many years
customer_reviews.text: I just replaced a black and decker toaster that I owned for 15 years so to say it they make awesome toasters that last.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Cote

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: From bagels to frozen waffles to English muffins, perfect every time
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love this toaster!!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought one a few years ago and my daughter needed a new one. She loves 4 slices and easy for my granddaughters to use because it is just like mine!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J

customer_reviews.title: dented product when box was opened
customer_reviews.text: got product jan.27 bridal shower was feb.22 wife learned march16 when she visited the couple when they opened the box the toaster was dented in front above controls the box was not dented so we had no idea it was damaged on the inside my wife was very disappointed when she found this out she likes toaster but shoudnt have a dented one which they might have for a very long time
customer_reviews.author: Corliss Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Good no frills toaster. works well.
customer_reviews.text: Good no frills toaster. It has been working without issue. Cooks toast properly on both sides and does not burn the toast.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E

customer_reviews.title: Good Bang for the Buck toaster!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good toaster for the $! Looks nice on the counter and seems to toast best on settings 5-6!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The double slots are so useful. Great size... fits those tasty Panera bagels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works as well!
customer_reviews.text: Nice wide slots cooks evenly every time. Best toaster we have had.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty2

customer_reviews.title: Great Moderne/Dieselpunk Style
customer_reviews.text: This has proven a workhorse, and shows no sign of slacking. The sliders don't just drop the toast: you can lift them to elevate that short piece of toast into grabbing range. It's easy to clean, especially since black doesn't show fingerprints as fast as steel or white, it seems. Like any 4-slice, getting it to the sink to pull the crumb trays is a little clumsy. It holds its settings well, though the first slice may not be as dark as later slices out of the same slot. If this one finally gives up, we hope to just get another.
customer_reviews.author: Lakota

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through a number of cheapie toasters over the years, and finally got tired of throwing them out and having to find a new one. One day I was at the counter of a local cafe and noticed two of these toasters in the service area. I was informed th at they had used these two in their restaurant for two years without a hitch. Off to Amazon. The toaster is fairly light compared to its picture, the exterior is easy to clean, and it works like a charm, and handles the occaisional english muffin or bagel without problem. Good price, good value.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Butka

customer_reviews.title: Going on 6 years strong with lots of use!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this almost everyday for 6 years now. There’s a bagel and frozen setting in addition to the darkness knob. It looks pretty sleek too. I have no complaints. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Zach the Outdoor Addict

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit to replace another that I had for the last 5 years, which burnt out
customer_reviews.author: Walton B. Smith Sr.

customer_reviews.title: It looks beautiful but the timer is unpredictable
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautiful but the timer is unpredictable. You can leave it in the same setting and it’ll burn it sometimes and not others. It’s frutrating. I need a new one to be honest
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is made of cheap flimsy metal. The temperature controls don't function properly and the Bagel setting doesn't work at all. We accidentally threw out the packaging or I would ship it back. Don't buy this product, it is just junk.
customer_reviews.author: Don K. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Worked great..only for 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this toaster . I've only had it one year - only used it about 1x per week and it was a perfectly good toaster. However, just recently, I put a pop tart in one of the slots, it dropped down to I don't know where! It was as if the bottom of the interior cage inside one of the slots disappeared. Being out of warranty I had to just throw it away. I've owned toasters that lasted years - and they weren't fancy or expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Taveira

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this and use it probably once a day. A couple months after purchasing it, I noticed that the toast I got out of one side was only getting browned on one side of the bread. I've since discovered that the "Bagel" setting is permanently stuck on for that side even if I don't press the button selecting Bagel mode, and even if the light is off. I've admittedly not reached out to the seller or manufacturer, but I'm still disappointed with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Knowlton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toaster
customer_reviews.text: Have had this toaster for nearly a year, and bought one that was 'open box' for $27 so technically not new. It's been an excellent toaster, and as others have said, it's a bit slow (maybe that saves energy?), the toast doesn't pop up quite high enough so you have to lift the handle a bit, and the cord is somewhat short, but ... it's still a great toaster. The slots are nice and wide, it has a "frozen" option, a bagel option, and a cancel button. It's easy to clean with individual trays. And my wife loves it! What more can I ask? Would buy another in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Takes longer to toast then our old toaster but does the job
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money! I have had this toaster since July and already it is broke. The bar that hold the food have came out on both sides making this unusable. I have already passed my return time frame so I’m pretty much screwed. Fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: MELANIE

customer_reviews.title: Great 4 slice toaster
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I love this toaster. It cooks super hot so almost everything on the low end of the dial. I love the frozen feature which cooks my kids Eggos perfectly. My only minor complaint is one slot is more curled at the bottom where the food sits so thin items occasionally fall down through and have to be fished out, but overall I'm super happy! And I scored a damaged box from Amazon Warehouse for a discount so double "yay" !
customer_reviews.author: RoyalSmash

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is a little bigger than I expected, You must turn knob to the darkest setting for muffins
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow Meza

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and works well except for an issue we have with the right side sticking.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Hockett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for a couple of months, every day.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful toaster. Slots are wide enough to handle bagels. I love the option to select frozen when toasting waffles from the freezer. Easy to clean slide out trays in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Marlea Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Have used this toaster several times. Toasted English muffins, bagels, and bread. Works great. Did find it puts out alot of heat so we set temperature on 2 1/2, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rizz.

customer_reviews.title: Find the setting you like and it will work the same every time
customer_reviews.text: Finally a toaster that gives repeatable results. Find the setting you like and it will work the same every time. Don't get me started on the vagaries of my last two toasters.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Toaster
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace an expensive toaster that didn't last long nor toast well during it's short lifetime. so far so good. Took us a while to get the settings on the toaster to deliver the toast the way we like it but after some fooling around with the controls for a few mornings we have finally found settings which give us toast with various types of bread that is to our liking. We just hope this toaster holds up better than the last one of another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Azbill007

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't really like is that it takes longer than usual to toast things. Otherwise, I have no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bigbaldguy

customer_reviews.title: Exchanged after 3 days
customer_reviews.text: Only had it 3 days. You must toast multiply times, even on highest setting, to get it to toast. 1 set seems to barely get red. Knobs on both sides are very loose and feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Henderson

customer_reviews.title: BLACK+DECKER 4-Slice Toaster,
customer_reviews.text: This BLACK+DECKER 4-Slice Toaster is used for Toast, Pop-Tarts and Bagels when the grandkids come over. It works well and is trouble free.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice Toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a very large and nice heavy duty toaster! Toasts bread and muffins great!!
customer_reviews.author: DJ's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: doesn't toast!
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of my money. Any new toaster should be able to toast with settings. I literally used the highest setting and still couldn't get good toasting. I've already ordered another brand. Pissed.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Not good for pop tarts
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well enough for toast but pop tarts constantly get stuck. My kids and I are so annoyed that they always slide off the lift and have to unplug and use tongs to get the pop tarts out, every time.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Good Find
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is amazing. Quality product for decent price. Fast delivery and better then expected.
customer_reviews.author: P. K. Erli

customer_reviews.title: Great working toaster
customer_reviews.text: This toaster works perfectly. The bread comes out evenly toasted on both sides. The chrome is easy to clean. The only bad thing is the pull out trays to clean out the toaster are on the back.
customer_reviews.author: j.lower

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Toaster works great. I have had it for 54 months now without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: B&D toaster 4 slice
customer_reviews.text: Did not brown on both sides as advertised. Enough said
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Porsavage

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this toaster to replace a two-slice unit. This works exactly how it is supposed to. Quick and easy to use. Does a GREAT job and is consistent in turning out wonderful toast.
customer_reviews.author: William F. Blue

customer_reviews.title: toaster
customer_reviews.text: very happy with our toaster, our old one was so old and this is nice to have a new one that does such a better job and also has lots of setting for brownness.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Blakemore

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: I don't love it... but it does the job. Its not really Black & Deckers fault its just that the toaster I had before this one was really great and they no long make it so this was the one that had to replace the GREAT toaster... I put bread in and it comes out crunchy. It does take up a lot of space but you are getting 4 pieces of toast at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: K Olds

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Only 2 out of the 4 worked and it was damaged in front
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toster making tost
customer_reviews.text: Purchased because my old one (had for 8 years) needed to be retired. So far it is doing what tosters are supposed to do, make tost.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Home slice.
customer_reviews.text: 4 home slice. Black n decker just invested $24mil to keep job in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Our last black and decker 4 slice toaster lasted 10 years. Love this new design quite a bit smaller foot print.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Toaster
customer_reviews.text: So much better than a two slot one. We are very happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't toast evenly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster because reviews said it evenly toasted both sides. It takes forever to toast and I have to flip the toast midway to get get anything like evenly toasted sides. It seems that nearly all manufacturers are ignoring what people want in a toaster. The bread dries out before it browns.
customer_reviews.author: mcvgNH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's nice having a good working toaster and it toasts the toast evenly on both sides is not amazing
customer_reviews.author: Serge DesRosiers

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Toaster
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this toaster. It looks nice, it's easy to use. We toast english muffins, bagels, bagel thins, sandwich thins and they all come out perfectly each time. I love the tray to catch the crumbs so they don't go on the floor if you move the toaster. I've always had a 2 slice toaster and from now on I would only have a 4 slice toaster, it just so much more convenient. And Black and Decker products are always top notch!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Edwards

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER T4569B 4-Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster, Black
product_meta.description:
Frozen waffles, toaster pastries, bagels, homemade breads, toaster hash browns and more this toaster with frozen, bagel and cancel functions toasts them all. Versatile capabilities and sleek styling make this toaster a real must-have for your kitchen. Great for families! Included Components: Toaster

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: Bagel, frozen, and cancel functions; 6 browning-control settings
Dual control panels for operating 2 slots independently from the other 2 slots
Cool-touch housing; cord-wrap storage; crumb tray ensures quick cleanup
Product Built to North American Electrical Standards
